verses.name: Psalms 121:1
verses.text: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.

verses.name: Psalms 121:2
verses.text: My help cometh from the Lord, which made heaven and earth.

verses.name: Psalms 121:3
verses.text: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.

verses.name: Psalms 121:4
verses.text: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.

verses.name: Psalms 121:5
verses.text: The Lord is thy keeper: the Lord is thy shade upon thy right hand.

verses.name: Psalms 121:6
verses.text: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.

verses.name: Psalms 121:7
verses.text: The Lord shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.
